description:
It is currently not merged with anything. Activate to permanently merge with it.

A complex battle suit brought to existence using the latest technological advancements. Secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel" takes advantage of the flesh's adaptive cell structure and its capability to respond from one's mind. Limited in interface features, it excels on dealing any situation thanks to its morphing and forming capability.

Merging with the secronom exoskeleton type "Vessel" provides:
<color_white>Stamina regeneration: <color_light_green>+25%</color>
Maximum health: <color_light_green>+5%</color>
Metabolism: <color_light_green>-5%</color></color>

use_action.msg: <color_light_green>The flesh vessel merges with your skin!
